sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A merrie pleasant and delectable historie, betvveene King Edvvard the fourth, and a tanner of Tamworth as he rode vpon a time with his nobles a hunting toward Drayton Basset. Verie pleasant and merrie to read.
[2], 8, [2] p. : ill.
By Iohn Danter, Printed at London : 1596.
In verse. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

[2], 8, [2] p. : ill.
By Iohn Danter, Printed at London : 1596.
In verse. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
